content.description:
The Estée Lauder Companies’ Breast Cancer Campaign is a global movement dedicated to raising awareness and funding for breast cancer research, education, and medical services. In 2022, I contributed to its EMEA rollout, leading employee engagement efforts to ensure internal communities were informed and actively participating.

I developed internal communication materials, including emails, digital posters, intranet articles, videos, and social media strategy. That year, we introduced employee ambassadors, providing them with pre-approved captions and personalized photos wearing pink ribbons to encourage participation.
